title: #182: Are You Concert Experienced (@NickYoussef)
itunes:title: Are You Concert Experienced with Nick Youssef
description: Nick Youssef and I were in Chicago to watch Arcade Fire and to do a show at Zanies to pay for it. So we decided to do a podcast all about concerts. Nick's been to a million concerts and I've been to a bunch of the ones he's been to. So it's a fun conversation about live music. Direct from Chitown.
